sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"让，允许"之意。
means: allow ：普通用词，侧重听任、默许或不加阻止。在正式场合可用来表客气的请求。
let ：常用词，用于各种非正式场合，语气最弱，指允许或无力阻止某事，暗示漠不关心或听之任之。
permit ：正式用词，在多数场合可与allow换用，语义最强，指准许某人做某事，含权威或正式的意味。
authorize ：语气最强，指权威性的允许与认可。

sentences.en: I don't think he would allow it.
sentences.cn: 我想他不会允许的。

sentences.en: Do they allow smoking in the cinemas?
sentences.cn: 他们允许在电影院里抽烟吗?

sentences.en: Allow me to introduce you to our headmaster.
sentences.cn: 请允许我介绍你见见我们的校长。

sentences.en: The court allowed a sum of money to each child for clothing.
sentences.cn: 法院判给每个孩子一笔服装费。

sentences.en: The referee refused to allow the goal.
sentences.cn: 裁判不承认这次进球。

sentences.en: You must allow yourself to be wrong.
sentences.cn: 你必须承认自己错了。

means.word_mean: 接受；承认；同意（某事属实或正确）

sentences.en: Jack had allowed himself to become fat.
sentences.cn: 杰克听任自己发胖。

means.word_mean: 容许某事发生(或存在)；容许(常与of连用)

sentences.en: a premise that allow of only one conclusion
sentences.cn: 假设容许只有一个结论</seg>

data.mean: 接受；承认；同意（某事属实或正确）
allow for sb/sth 考虑到；估计到；把…计算在内
allow of sth 容许；使有可能

sentence.cn: 学生宿舍不允许携带的物品包括：蜡烛、吊扇、烟火、水床、日光灯和无线路由器。
sentence.en: Items that are not allowed in student rooms include: candles,  ceiling fans,  fireworks,  waterbeds,  sun lamps and wireless routers.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

sentence.cn: 甚至当机器被回收，有害金属被清除，回收过程经常在贫穷的国家进行，实际上是不受控制的方式，允许许多有毒物质进入环境。
sentence.en: Even when the machines are recycled and the harmful metals removed,  the recycling process often is carried out in poor countries,  in practically uncontrolled ways which allow many poisonous substances to escape into the environment.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

entry.def: If someone is allowed to do something, it is all right for them to do it and they will not get into trouble.

example.ex: The children are not allowed to watch violent TV programmes...
example.tran: 儿童不准收看含暴力内容的电视节目。

example.ex: The Government will allow them to advertise on radio and television...
example.tran: 政府将准许他们在广播和电视上做广告。

entry.def: If you are allowed something, you are given permission to have it or are given it.

example.ex: Gifts like chocolates or flowers are allowed...
example.tran: 巧克力、鲜花等礼物在允许之列。

example.ex: He should be allowed the occasional treat.
example.tran: 应该准许他偶尔也轻松一下。

entry.def: If you allow something to happen, you do not prevent it.

example.ex: He won't allow himself to fail...
example.tran: 他不会任由自己失败的。

example.ex: If the soil is allowed to dry out the tree could die.
example.tran: 如果听任土壤变干，树木可能会枯死。

entry.def: If one thing allows another thing to happen, the first thing creates the opportunity for the second thing to happen.

example.ex: The compromise will allow him to continue his free market reforms.
example.tran: 妥协将使他得以继续他的自由市场改革。

example.ex: ...an attempt to allow the Moslem majority a greater share of power...
example.tran: 使穆斯林多数派拥有更大权力的尝试

entry.def: If you allow a particular length of time or a particular amount of something for a particular purpose, you include it in your planning.

example.ex: Allow about 75ml (3fl oz) per six servings.
example.tran: 每6份酌加约75毫升(3液盎司)。

entry.def: If you allow that something is true, you admit or agree that it is true.

example.ex: Warren also allows that capitalist development may, in its early stages, result in increased social inequality.
example.tran: 沃伦也承认资本主义发展初级阶段可能会导致社会不平等现象加剧。

entry.def: Some people say 'Allow me' as a polite way of offering to do something for someone.
entry.tran: 请允许我（用以礼貌地表示为某人提供服务）

example.ex: Allow me to buy you a drink at the bar.

entry.def: Some people use Allow me to... as a way of introducing something that they want to say or do.
entry.tran: 请允许我（用以引出要说的话）

example.ex: Allow me to introduce Dr Amberg.
example.tran: 请允许我介绍安伯格博士。

means.word_mean: 1. make it possible through a specific action or lack of action for something to happen;

sentences.sentence: "This permits the water to rush in"
"This sealed door won't allow the water come into the basement"
"This will permit the rain to run off"
"She permitted her son to visit her estranged husband"
"I won't let the police search her basement"
"I cannot allow you to see your exam"
"grant permission"
"Mandela was allowed few visitors in prison"

means.word_mean: 4. give or assign a share of money or time to a particular person or cause;

sentences.sentence: "I will earmark this money for your research"

means.word_mean: 5. make a possibility or provide opportunity for; permit to be attainable or cause to remain;

sentences.sentence: "This leaves no room for improvement"
"The evidence allows only one conclusion"
"allow for mistakes"
"leave lots of time for the trip"
"This procedure provides for lots of leeway"

means.word_mean: 6. allow or plan for a certain possibility; concede the truth or validity of something;

sentences.sentence: "I allow for this possibility"
"The seamstress planned for 5% shrinkage after the first wash"
"This problem admits of no solution"
"This short story allows of several different interpretations"

means.word_mean: 8. allow the other (baseball) team to score;

sentences.sentence: "give up a run"

means.word_mean: 9. grant as a discount or in exchange;

sentences.sentence: "The camera store owner allowed me $50 on my old camera"

means.word_mean: 10. allow the presence of or allow (an activity) without opposing or prohibiting;

sentences.sentence: "We don't allow dogs here"
"Children are not permitted beyond this point"
"We cannot tolerate smoking in the hospital"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (originally in the senses 'commend, sanction' and 'assign as a right'): from Old French alouer, from Latin allaudare 'to praise', reinforced by medieval Latin allocare 'to place' (see allocate)

sentences.cn: 她不会听人摆布的。
sentences.en: She won't allow herself to be dictated to.

sentences.cn: 他听任自己的思绪信马由缰。
sentences.en: He allowed his mind to wander.

sentences.cn: 大厅内不准吸烟。
sentences.en: Smoking is not allowed in the hall.

sentences.cn: 我们不准有人在大厅内吸烟。
sentences.en: We do not allow smoking in the hall.

sentences.cn: 你们有一个小时的时间来完成这次测验。
sentences.en: You're allowed an hour to complete the test.

sentences.cn: 我不可以接见来访者。
sentences.en: I'm not allowed visitors.

sentences.cn: 不准携狗入内。
sentences.en: No dogs allowed (= you cannot bring them in) .

sentences.cn: 囚犯每天可以放风两小时。
sentences.en: The prisoners are allowed out of their cells for two hours a day.

sentences.cn: 人群向两旁闪开让她通过。
sentences.en: The crowd parted to allow her through .

sentences.cn: 你将有几天不能下床。
sentences.en: You won't be allowed up (= out of bed) for several days.

sentences.cn: 坡道便于轮椅进出。
sentences.en: A ramp allows easy access for wheelchairs.

sentences.cn: 这身衣服你需要用三米布料。
sentences.en: You need to allow three metres of fabric for the dress.

sentences.cn: 法官同意我的要求。
sentences.en: The judge allowed my claim.

sentences.cn: “反对！”“反对成立。”
sentences.en: ‘Objection! ’ ‘I'll allow it. ’

sentences.cn: 他的父母不会允许他在外待得很晚。
sentences.en: His parents won't allow him to stay out late.

sentences.cn: 他不可以在外待到很晚。
sentences.en: He is not allowed to stay out late.

sentences.cn: 不应就此放过他们。
sentences.en: They shouldn't be allowed to get away with it.

sentences.cn: 政府将准许他们在广播和电视上做广告。
sentences.en: The Government will allow them to advertise on radio and television...

sentences.cn: 巧克力、鲜花等礼物在允许之列。
sentences.en: Gifts like chocolates or flowers are allowed...

sentences.cn: 应该准许他偶尔也轻松一下。
sentences.en: He should be allowed the occasional treat.

sentences.cn: 他不会任由自己失败的。
sentences.en: He won't allow himself to fail...

sentences.cn: 如果听任土壤变干，树木可能会枯死。
sentences.en: If the soil is allowed to dry out the tree could die.

sentences.cn: 妥协将使他得以继续他的自由市场改革。
sentences.en: The compromise will allow him to continue his free market reforms.

sentences.cn: 使穆斯林多数派拥有更大权力的尝试
sentences.en: ...an attempt to allow the Moslem majority a greater share of power...

sentences.cn: 请留出28天的送货时间。
sentences.en: Please allow 28 days for delivery...

sentences.cn: 每6份酌加约75毫升(3液盎司)。
sentences.en: Allow about 75ml (3fl oz) per six servings.

sentences.cn: 沃伦也承认资本主义发展初级阶段可能会导致社会不平等现象加剧。
sentences.en: Warren also allows that capitalist development may, in its early stages, result in increased social inequality.

sentences.cn: 让我来请你喝一杯。
sentences.en: Allow me to buy you a drink at the bar.

sentences.cn: 请允许我介绍安伯格博士。
sentences.en: Allow me to introduce Dr Amberg.

sentences.cn: 儿童不准收看含暴力内容的电视节目。
sentences.en: The children are not allowed to watch violent TV programmes...

sentences.cn: 他的父母不会允许他在外待得很晚。
sentences.en: His parents won't allow him to stay out late.

sentences.cn: 巧克力、鲜花等礼物在允许之列。
sentences.en: Gifts like chocolates or flowers are allowed...

sentences.cn: 请允许我介绍安伯格博士。
sentences.en: Allow me to introduce Dr Amberg.

sentences.cn: 奥巴马政府本质上是在宣称，因为它自己不想执行国会关于移民的诉求，所以各州也都不被允许这么做。
sentences.en: The Administration was in essence asserting that because it didn’t want to carry out Congress’s immigration wishes, no stale should be allowed to do so either.

sentences.cn: 有一种建议是允许学生在本科就修读法律专业。
sentences.en: One idea is to allow people to study law as an undergraduate degree.

sentences.cn: 民选领袖应该被允许去帮助其支持者处理官僚问题而无须担心被起诉受贿。
sentences.en: Elected leaders must be allowed to help supporters deal with bureaucratic problems without fear of prosecution of bribery.

sentences.cn: 学区管理人员称家庭作业仍将是学校教育的一部分；教师被允许自主安排作业量。
sentences.en: District administrators say that homework will still be a part of schooling: teachers are allowed to assign as much of it as they want.

sentences.cn: 国会需要勇气来允许老年人医疗保险优先为那些已被证明效果更好的治疗支付费用。
sentences.en: Congress needs to find the courage to allow Medicare to pay preferentially for treatments proven to be superior.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 允许观众使用遥控器点击广告的交互式电视广告已经推行了好几年了。
sentences.en: Interactive television advertising, which allows viewers to use their remote controls to click on advertisements, has been pushed for years.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 直到1955年，华莱士夫妇才接受在《读者文摘》美国版上投放广告，但即便如此，他们也不允许杂志上出现任何有关香烟、酒或药品的广告。
sentences.en: The Wallaces didn't accept advertising in the US edition until 1955 and even then they didn’t allow any ads for cigarettes, liquor or drugs
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 此外，应该允许他们授课，并奖励教课优秀的教师。
sentences.en: Additionally, they should be allowed to teach, and be rewarded for doing it well.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在 美 国， 当 前有 36 个州允许对谋杀这样的重罪实施死刑。
sentences.en: In the United States, 36 states currently allow capital punishment for serious crimes such as mur der.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 在允许死刑的36 个州里，有 30 个州准许对未成年人实施死刑。
sentences.en: Of the 36?states that allow the death penalty, 30 permit the execution of minors.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 请允许我解释我们提出建议的目的.
sentences.en: Allow me to elaborate our suggestion on this activity, please.

sentences.cn: 只有下课以后才允许他提出这个问题.
sentences.en: Only after class was he allowed to raise the question.

sentences.cn: 生日聚会之后,这个孩子的朋友被允许在他家过夜.
sentences.en: The boy's friends were allowed to sleep over after the birthday party.

sentences.cn: 请允许我给您介绍我的好朋友张先生.
sentences.en: Please allow me to introduce my good friend, Mr. Zhang to you.

sentences.cn: 请允许我做一下解释, 我不希望有任何的误会.
sentences.en: Please allow me to explain this better. I don't want any misunderstandings.

sentences.cn: 法律不允许有这种行为.
sentences.en: The law does not allow such actions.

sentences.cn: 玩家XXX使用不允许的ID而被清理.
sentences.en: Play home XXX use no allow ID and be clean.

sentences.cn: 您应该允许我在她是否愚蠢这一点上保留自己的看法.
sentences.en: You will allow me to have my own opinion about her foolishness.

sentences.cn: 此命令只允许在交互方式下使用.
sentences.en: Command is allowed only in interactive mode.

sentences.cn: 谢谢, 但我们上班时间是不允许喝酒的.
sentences.en: Thank you, but we are not allowed to drink on duty.

sentences.cn: 这样就允许了一种安全的使用模式,它可以被用于检测程序的错误.
sentences.en: This allows a safer use mode and it can be used to detect programming errors.

sentences.cn: 每一个燃烧器都应用一个阀门或允许燃烧器供开与关的装置.
sentences.en: Each burner controlled bu a tap or device allowing the opening and closing of its supply.

sentences.cn: 计算机器的等价年成本就允许无偏的比较.
sentences.en: Calculating the machines'equivalent annual costs allows an unbiased comparison.

sentences.cn: 虽然种族岐视是不允许的.
sentences.en: Although racial discrimination is not allowed.

sentences.cn: 不允许使用指定的发布许可证进行服务器重新发布.
sentences.en: Server republishing is not allowed using the specified publishing license.

sentences.cn: 有些部门仅仅允许特殊的家庭成员去探病.
sentences.en: Some units only allow certain family members to visit.

sentences.cn: 他要求允许他继续和他们待在一起.
sentences.en: He asked to be allowed to stay on with them.

sentences.cn: 他拒不承认这种情况可能发生。
sentences.en: He refuses to allow that such a situation could arise.

sentences.cn: 沃伦也承认资本主义发展初级阶段可能会导致社会不平等现象加剧。
sentences.en: Warren also allows that capitalist development may, in its early stages, result in increased social inequality.

sentences.cn: 他承认他们是对的.
sentences.en: He allowed that they were right.

sentences.cn: 我承认他是一个能干的人.
sentences.en: I allow that he is an able man.

sentences.cn: 他承认我们是对的.
sentences.en: He allowed that we were right.

sentences.cn: 那军官承认这是一辆美国制造的坦克.
sentences.en: The officer allowed that it was an American tank.

sentences.cn: 控制光束是研发中最具挑战性的任务了, 泰勒承认.
sentences.en: Controlling the beam phase has been the most significant challenge faced in development, Trainor allows.

sentences.cn: 没有人不承认他的才华过人.
sentences.en: His brilliance was allowed by all.

sentences.cn: 让我们自己享受承认人类的弱点的快乐是一大慰藉.
sentences.en: It is a great relief to allow us ourselves the luxury of acknowledging our human frailties.

sentences.cn: 我承认他是对的.
sentences.en: I allowed as how he was right.

sentences.cn: 你应当承认自己错了.
sentences.en: You must allow yourself to be in the wrong.

sentences.cn: 你怎么就不承认她错了呢.
sentences.en: How come you don't allow that she's wrong.

sentences.cn: 因此,当挫折出现时就去感受一下吧. 承认它, 接受它,欢迎它.
sentences.en: So ahead and feel that frustration when it comes. Allow it, accept it and welcome it.

sentences.cn: 我们必须承认他是一个天才.
sentences.en: We must allow him to be a genius.

sentences.cn: 有承认的焊接修理 吗 ?
sentences.en: Is weld repair allowed?

sentences.cn: 我们承认他对了.
sentences.en: We allowed that he was right.

sentences.cn: 法官承认了这一要求.
sentences.en: The judge allowed the claim.

sentences.cn: 她承认加里波第的感情生活并不和谐.
sentences.en: She allows that his love life had its jarring moments.

sentences.cn: 你得承认, 杀鹿人, 明果人抵得上半个魔鬼哩.
sentences.en: You will allow, Deerslayer, that a Mingo is more than half devil.

sentences.cn: 我们应该承认他是对的.
sentences.en: We must allow him to be right.

sentences.cn: 我们承认他是一个天才.
sentences.en: We allow that he is a genius.

sentences.cn: 他们都承认他是一位优秀足球运动员.
sentences.en: They all allow him to be a good football player.

sentences.cn: 我们应当承认他是一个诚实的人.
sentences.en: We must allow him to be an honest man.

sentences.cn: 我承认我这样做轻率了一点.
sentences.en: I allow that I was a bit hasty.

sentences.cn: “ 不, ” 他说,舔一舔自己的嘴唇, “ 可是你得承认, 这是一个悲凄的结局. ”
sentences.en: " No,'said he wetting his lips, " but you'll allow yourself, it's a cold ending. "

sentences.cn: 你必须承认自己错了.
sentences.en: You must allow yourself to be wrong.

sentences.cn: 我们必须承认他是个好译员.
sentences.en: We must allow him to be a good interpreter.

sentences.cn: 詹姆士承认,他可能对我的朋友是不太礼貌.
sentences.en: James allowed that he might have been impolite to my friends.

sentences.cn: 许多杰出的科学家因此而未被承认, 他们的才能还未发挥出来便已经消亡了.
sentences.en: How many exceptional scientists around the world thereby unrecognized, their talents allowed to wither away untapped?

sentences.cn: 放弃控制权承认了你没有增加工资的权力的可信.
sentences.en: Relinquishing control allows you to credibly claim that you cannot increase wages.

sentences.cn: 凭教会给予的特许状, 她获准再婚.
sentences.en: By a special dispensation from the Church, she was allowed to remarry.

sentences.cn: 巴基斯坦允许它的公民持有双重国籍,那么为什么拒绝给予参政者这一的法律权利?
sentences.en: Pakistan allows its citizens to hold dual nationalities so why deny politicians this legal right?

sentences.cn: 一般的对于混合消化泥浆的设计是给予三个月的干燥期.
sentences.en: For mixed digested sludge the usual design is to allow for three months drying time.

sentences.cn: 请给予结算公司三个办公日来处理贵户的更改通知及更新有关记录.
sentences.en: Please allow three business days for HKSCC to process your change request and update its records.

sentences.cn: 有时候该银行给予出口商多达5000美元的信贷.
sentences.en: The bank sometimes allows exporters a credit accommodation up to US $ 5 000.

sentences.cn: 别担心, 如果你们的销量大幅度增长,我们会给予更高的佣金.
sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll allow you a higher commission rate if your sales score a substantial increase.

sentences.cn: 拥金同意给予提供''.'服务'.''的''.'销售'.''代表或代理人的酬金或百分比.
sentences.en: A fee or percentage allowed to a sales representative or an agent for services rendered.

sentences.cn: 卖方为增加销量,对售出的商品给予一定的折扣.
sentences.en: The seller is allowing some discount on the goods in order to increase sale.

sentences.cn: 只有对十分特殊的客户,我们才给予10%的折扣.
sentences.en: Only for very special customers do we allow them a rate of 10 % discount.

sentences.cn: 无明显禁忌症时,服用皮质类固醇及抗生素时也可给予宫缩抑制剂.
sentences.en: Tocolytics can be given to allow administration of antenatal corticosteroids and antibiotics.

sentences.cn: 凭教会“给予”的特许状, 她获准再婚.
sentences.en: By adispensation from the Church, she was allowed to remarry.

sentences.cn: 这个课程给予学生有关国际品牌管理最先进的知识.
sentences.en: This program allows students gain a fundamental understanding of human resource management in an international context.

sentences.cn: 贵公司货款超过1500美元的订购单, 我们都将给予百分之五的折扣.
sentences.en: We can allow a 5 % discount on all orders over US $ 1 , 500 in value.

sentences.cn: 你方愿意破例给予5%的折扣,我们感到满意.
sentences.en: To our satisfaction you will make us an exception by allowing 5 percent discount.

sentences.cn: 法院休庭,给予公诉方找到觅失的证人的时间.
sentences.en: The court adjourn to allow the prosecution time to find the missing witness.

sentences.cn: 这类情况就给予了电影制作者一些弹性的空间.
sentences.en: So that allowed a little bit of flexibility for the filmmakers.

sentences.cn: CrystalLight衍生的方法学给予开发者最多的个性化.
sentences.en: The Crystal Light family is predicated on allowing developers the maximum individual preference.

sentences.cn: 只有对十分特殊的客户,我们才给予10%的折扣.
sentences.en: Only for very special customer do we allow them a rate of 10 % discount.

sentences.cn: 学生在选课方面应给予更多的馀地.
sentences.en: The students should be given [ allowed , permitted ] more latitude in choosing course.

sentences.cn: 不知贵公司能否给予90天的宽限来偿付这份请款单?
sentences.en: Are you able to allow us a further 90 days to clear this bill?

sentences.cn: 我公司仅限于从发票开出之日起10日内付现金者给予折扣优待.
sentences.en: We only allow a cash discount on payments made within ten days of date of invoice.

sentences.cn: 我们对10日内付现金给予20%的折扣.
sentences.en: We allow a cash discount of 20 % on payments made within ten days.

sentences.cn: 在如何使用零花钱上,他们给予孩子太多的自由.
sentences.en: They allow their children too much latitude in how they spend the pocket money.

sentences.cn: 如果你方能订购5000打或5000打以上,我们将给予10%的折扣.
sentences.en: We will allow you 10 % discount if you purchase 5000 dozens or more.

sentences.cn: 这种商品你们是否给予折扣?
sentences.en: Do you allow any discount on this commodity?

sentences.cn: 根据本规例允许给予的津贴支出,须由政府一般收入支付.
sentences.en: The expenses of allowances allowed under this Regulation shall be a charge on the general revenue.

sentences.cn: 只有对十分特别的客户,我们才给予百分之十的折扣.
sentences.en: Only for very special customers do we allow them rate of 10 % discount.

sentences.cn: 若购买1万公吨,我们可给予你方3%的折扣.
sentences.en: We can allow you 3 % discount on purchase of ten thousand metric tons.

sentences.cn: 第二十三条进口属于自动进口许可管理的货物,均应当给予许可.
sentences.en: Article 23 The import of goods that are under automatic import license administration shall be allowed.

sentences.cn: “凭”教会给予的特许状, 她获准再婚.
sentences.en: By dispensation from the Church, she was allowed to remarry.

sentences.cn: 政府将准许他们在广播和电视上做广告。
sentences.en: The Government will allow them to advertise on radio and television...

sentences.cn: 应该准许他偶尔也轻松一下。
sentences.en: He should be allowed the occasional treat.

sentences.cn: 在允许死刑的36 个州里，有 30 个州准许对未成年人实施死刑。
sentences.en: Of the 36?states that allow the death penalty, 30 permit the execution of minors.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 当菲利浦被准许探视她的时候, 婴儿正在她的身边躺着.
sentences.en: When Philip was allowed to see her, the child was lying by her side.

sentences.cn: 宠物不准许进入广场、草地与建筑物内.
sentences.en: Pets are not allowed on the grounds or in the buildings.

sentences.cn: 她的父母准许她去, 但是有一个条件,那就是她在午夜以前必须回家.
sentences.en: Her parents allowed her to go, but a condition that she should get home before midnight.

sentences.cn: 难道政府部门准许不合理的税收增加 吗 ?
sentences.en: Does the government allow of unjustified tax increases?

sentences.cn: 法令准许政府接管公共事业和企业.
sentences.en: The decree allows the government to take over public utilities and businesses.

sentences.cn: 这个图书馆只准许老师进入.
sentences.en: Only the teachers were allowed into the library.

sentences.cn: 当不准许主动齿轮旋转时,向上推环齿轮,并放牢它.
sentences.en: Push and hold ring gear upward while not allowing the pinion gear to rotate.

sentences.cn: 巡逻队: 指挥部,9点种方向有武装车扫射平民, 请准许攻击!
sentences.en: Patrol party: Conductor department the direction have armed the car strafe a civilian, please allow attack!

sentences.cn: 担任这个职务的人被准许在退休后进入骑士阶层.
sentences.en: Service in this position also allowed entry into the equestrian social class upon retirement.

sentences.cn: 宪法条约准许我们无需获得英国政府赞同而更改我们的宪法.
sentences.en: The Constitution Act allowed us to change our Constitution without asking the British Government for approval.

sentences.cn: 这个半岛被开凿运河来准许船只进入东方的水域.
sentences.en: The peninsula was canalled to allow eastward passage for ships.

sentences.cn: 他们准许我出去打一个电话.
sentences.en: They allowed me out in order to make a telephone call.

sentences.cn: 不准许转船.
sentences.en: Transhipment is not allowed.

sentences.cn: 装运口岸和目的地准许分批与转船.
sentences.en: Loading Port & Destination: From with transshipment and partial shipments allowed.

sentences.cn: 为什麽神准许这样的事发生?
sentences.en: Why does God allow all these to happen?

sentences.cn: 但是,新的选举法准许最大的单一政团囊括各委员会.
sentences.en: But a new electoral law allows the largest single group to sweep the board.

sentences.cn: 这个游泳池准许男女一起游泳.
sentences.en: Mixed bathing is allowed in this swimming pool.

sentences.cn: 每位乘客准许携带二十公斤行李.
sentences.en: Each passenger is allowed twenty kilogrammes of luggage.

sentences.cn: 他要求准许他们用词典.
sentences.en: He asked that they ( should ) be allowed to use a dictionary.

sentences.cn: 准许律师做广告 吗 ?
sentences.en: Are lawyers allowed to advertise?

sentences.cn: 在学校里只准许他们出售不含酒精的饮料.
sentences.en: They are only allowed to sell soft drinks at school.

sentences.cn: 如准许多批装运,我们就接受订货.
sentences.en: We accept the order provided part shipment is allowed.

sentences.cn: 准许我提一个建议 吗 ?
sentences.en: Am I allowed to make a suggestion?

sentences.cn: 装运口岸和目的地准许分批或转船.
sentences.en: Loading port & Destination: From transshipment partial shipments allowed.

sentences.cn: 按照法律, 每一原告 、 被告及法官都准许有等长的时间发言.
sentences.en: According to the law, the accuser, the accused, and the judge were each allowed to talk for the same length of time.

sentences.cn: 你们工作时准许吸烟 吗 ?
sentences.en: Are you allowed to smoke at work?

sentences.cn: 不应该准许他有那样的举止, 我是说他已经是成年人了.
sentences.en: He can't be allowed to behave like that; I meant to say, he's a grown man.

sentences.cn: 不容许压力排水关与建筑内重力排水管合并排出.
sentences.en: Does not allow drainage clearance and the stress inside the building gravity drainage from the merger.

sentences.cn: 宽阔的人行道可容许多人同时行走.
sentences.en: A wide promenade allows many people to walk at the same time.

sentences.cn: 我不会容许我自己被恐惧吓跑的.
sentences.en: I won't allow myself to be stampeded by fear.

sentences.cn: 我不会容许我的女儿和比她地位低下的人结婚的.
sentences.en: I shall not allow my daughter to marry so far beneath her.

sentences.cn: 在容许饲养禽畜的地区, 所有禽畜饲养场均须装设适当的废物处理系统.
sentences.en: Where they are allowed, all livestock farms must be equipped with proper waste treatment systems.

sentences.cn: 如果容许焊剂部件出于竖立状态, 则焊剂内的水分将会蒸发掉.
sentences.en: If fluxed parts are allowed to stand, the water in the flux will evaporate.

sentences.cn: 并容许他人利用你的才能.
sentences.en: And allow other human beings to access you for the many gifts you possess.

sentences.cn: 由于卖货太多,不容许我们接受新的订货.
sentences.en: We have too many commitments to allow us to take on new orders.

sentences.cn: 国家虽有大小, 但它的内政是不容许外国干涉的.
sentences.en: The internal affairs of any state , whether it's big or small, do not allow of external interference.

sentences.cn: 农村的富农经济,也是容许其存在的.
sentences.en: A rich peasant economy will be allowed in the rural areas.

sentences.cn: 他不容许意识形态妨碍他的政党承担执政的历史使命.
sentences.en: Ideology could not be allowed to obstruct his party's historic duty to hold office.

sentences.cn: 我们决不容许自己被人轻视.
sentences.en: We will not allow ourselves to be trampled upon.

sentences.cn: 不容许侵略者赖在别国的领土上.
sentences.en: The aggressors must not be allowed to hold on to the territories of other countries.

sentences.cn: 你就不容许有例外情况?
sentences.en: You allow of no exceptions?

sentences.cn: 容许水汽从坩埚中离开.
sentences.en: To allow the water vapour to escape from the crucible.

sentences.cn: 我们不容许任何补偿.
sentences.en: We do not allow any compensation.

sentences.cn: 禁戒跃迁指的是选择定则所不容许的偶极辐射跃迁.
sentences.en: Forbidden transitions are those for which dipole radiative transitions are not allowed by the selection rules.

sentences.cn: 我们不容许有这种事情发生.
sentences.en: We don't allow such things to be done.

sentences.cn: 刘博士没有理由容许自己被奖牌诱惑.
sentences.en: Dr. Liew had no reason to allow himself to be enticed award.

sentences.cn: 这容许两次石油电路独立工作的优势.
sentences.en: This has the advantage of allowing the two oil circuits to work independently.

sentences.cn: 我绝不容许人家利用激将法,使我恨他,来达到卑视自己性灵的目的.
sentences.en: I shall allow no man to belittle my soul by making me hate him.

sentences.cn: 到底是怎样的疯狂,才会容许为某种抽象观念而牺牲如此众多的生命?
sentences.en: What exactly is the insanity that would allow so many to die for such an abstraction?

sentences.cn: 银行不容许他再次推迟付款.
sentences.en: The bank do not allow further deferment of his payment.

sentences.cn: 这项工作不容许有任何疏忽.
sentences.en: This task does not allow any omissions.

sentences.cn: 难道能容许他们随心所欲地破坏规章制度 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can they be allowed to violate rules and regulations at will?

sentences.cn: 我们不能袖手旁观,容许这样的事情发生.
sentences.en: We can't stand by and allow such a thing.

sentences.cn: 我们不能接受这种分歧, 也无法容许它的存在.
sentences.en: We do not accept this, and we will not allow it.

sentences.cn: 帕麦尔的尊严不容许她与社会地位与她低的人争吵.

sentences.cn: 金属和其他容许电荷在其中迁移的材料叫做导体.
sentences.en: Metals and other substances that allow the motion of electric charge through them are called conductors.

sentences.cn: 校规不容许个人恣意任行.
sentences.en: School rules allow the individual little latitude.

sentences.cn: 考虑到交通阻塞，到那里大约需要一小时。
sentences.en: It will take about an hour to get there, allowing for traffic delays.

sentences.cn: 她考虑衣服洗后会缩水,把它做大些.
sentences.en: She made the dress larger to allow for shrinking when it was washed.

sentences.cn: 我们还是早些动身为好. 我们要考虑到路上交通会有耽搁.
sentences.en: We'd better start earlier. We should allow for traffic delays.

sentences.cn: 你的计划是否把各种情况都考虑进去了?
sentences.en: Has everything been allowed for in your plan?

sentences.cn: 考虑到还得找他们的家,我们必须早动身.
sentences.en: We must start early to allow for finding their house.

sentences.cn: 你做这个设计时, 请把误差考虑进去.
sentences.en: When you do the design, please allow for the errors.

sentences.cn: 考虑到生活支出费用的下降, 南方黑人已经到达了“小康”.

sentences.cn: 这段旅程通常需六周时间,但你应当把坏天气造成的延误也要考虑进去.
sentences.en: The journey usually takes six weeks but you should allow for delays caused by bad weather.

sentences.cn: 把路上可能的延误考虑进去,到达那儿大约要两个小时.

sentences.cn: 此外, 它还可以考虑一些替代按揭贷款为每个属性正在审议中.

sentences.cn: 要不要到有病孩子可能打打闹闹的游乐场去,或参加他们的活动,你可要再三考虑考虑.
sentences.en: Think twice about attending playgroups or activities where sick kids might be allowed to roam.

sentences.cn: 这个简单的调查格式没有考虑到客户的参与性.
sentences.en: The simple survey format does not allow for client participation.

sentences.cn: 定计划要留有余地,要考虑到意外发生的事情.
sentences.en: Allow for unexpected things.

sentences.cn: 我考虑到了这种可能性.
sentences.en: I allow for this possibility.

sentences.cn: 制定郊游计划时,应考虑到天气因素.
sentences.en: You should allow for the weather when you plan for an outing.

sentences.cn: 那些考虑到更小的改变或者改进的问题更具可行性.

sentences.cn: 还是把坏天气考虑在内,这样就比较谨慎了.

sentences.cn: 我们正处在一个很敏感的时期,我们不考虑说那么多.

sentences.cn: 形式逻辑允许你检查合乎逻辑的索赔而没有考虑到索赔的意思.

sentences.en: It does not allow for fumigation. It does not allow for any alternative disposal methods.

sentences.cn: 考虑到天气的恶劣,我们应马上动身.

sentences.cn: 我们应考虑到水灾.

sentences.cn: 最后, 如果你的照相机允许的话考虑使用RAW格式.
sentences.en: Finally, consider shooting the RAW file format if your camera allows.

sentences.en: Even allowing for his age, he still acts very immaturely.

sentences.cn: 如果你的预算允许的话,考虑更换这些设备并上升到中央空调.
